metadata.title: CVE-2022-1145 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Extensions in Google Chrome prior to 100.0.4896.60allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto potentially exploit heap corruption via specific user interaction andprofile destruction.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
